title: Freddie Mercury - The Solo Collection Part V (The Video Collecti
description:
*******************************************************************************
Freddie Mercury - The Solo Collection Part V (The Video Collection)
*******************************************************************************


Tracklist:

1. Barcelona (Live)
2. The Great Pretender (Single Version)
3. I Was Born To Love You
4. Time (2000 Remix)
5. How Can I Go On (Live)
6. Made In Heaven
7. Living On My Own (Original)
8. The Golden Boy (Live)
9. The Great Pretender (Extended Version)
10. Barcelona (Single Version)
11. In My Defence (2000 Re-Edit)
12. Guide Me Home (Titles; Piano version performed by Thierry Lang)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are both a stereo and a 5.1 surround audio mix for each track. Surround
Sound mixes produced by David Richards and Peter Cobbin except 'I Was Born To
Love You' and 'Made In Heaven', produced by Mack, 'Time' and 'In My Defence',
produced by Dave Clark, and 'Living On My Own', produced by Paul Hicks.

This is intended to be played on a PC or a HTPC. If it works on your standalone
player, good for you. You can always convert it to a regular DVD using tools as
ConvertXtoDVD.

Check you have installed the right codecs, as listed in this .nfo file, before
trying to play it. VLC will play this file without having to install any codec.

There are two audio tracks in this file. If you don't have an updated AC3
audio codec installed, you might hear strange echoes or unbalanced sound. Check
you have them and update before posting about it. VLC will play this video
flawlessly and allow you to select/change between those audio tracks.

If you don't like the codec(s), container, resolution, file size, languages or
any technical aspect on this rip, keep it to yourself and go and do your own.

Serious feedback on quality will always be welcome.

This is a part of the 10cd+2DVD box The Freddie Mercury Solo Collection

Part I: The Albums
CD01 Mr. Bad Guy
CD02 Barcelona

Part II: The Singles
CD04 The Singles 1973-1985
CD05 The Singles 1986-1993

Part III: Rarities
CD06 Rarities I (Mr. Bad Guy Sessions)
CD07 Rarities II (Barcelona Sessions)
CD08 Rarities III (Other Sessions)

Part IV: Remixes, Instrumentals and Interviews
CD03 The Great Pretender
CD09 Instrumentals
CD10 David Wigg Interviews

Part V: The Video Collection (H.264/AC3 DVDRip)

Part VI: The Untold Story (H.264/AC3 DVDRip)
